Gdy między nią a Karlukiem rozkwita głębsze uczucie, w mieście pojawia się starszy brat Amir, żądając unieważnienia małżeństwa. Między dwoma rodzinami wybucha spór.","ru":"Это истории из жизни Амиры - прекрасной лучницы и наездницы, посланной за горы, чтобы выйти замуж за Карлука - одного из поселенцев, который младше её на 8 лет. Благодаря многим своим умениям, Амира быстро находит себе место среди жителей деревни. Однак найбільше бажання Аміри – стати йому гарною дружиною. Вона усіма силами старається догодити і йому, і своїй новій родині, дивуючи давно осілих землеробів своїми талантами.","vi":"Vào thế kỉ 19, ở khu vực Trung Á, tại một vùng thị tứ gần biển Caspi…\n\nCó Benio lost her mother when she was very young and has been raised by her father, a high-ranking official in the Japanese army. As a result, she has grown into a tomboy—contrary to traditional Japanese notions of femininity, she studies kendo, drinks sake, dresses in often outlandish-looking Western fashions, and isn't as interested in housewife duties as she is in literature. She also rejects the idea of arranged marriages and believes in a woman's right to a career and to marry for love. Benio's best friends are the beautiful Tamaki, who is much more feminine than Benio but equally interested in women's rights, and Ranmaru, a young man who was raised to play female roles in the kabuki theater and as a result has acquired very effeminate mannerisms.  \n  \n---\n- **Won the 1st Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 1977, which it shared with Candy Candy**"},"links":{"al":"31567","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/gp/product/B078MLGH15?ref_=dbs_r_series\u0026storeType=ebooks","ap":"haikara-san-ga-tooru","kt":"3336","mal":"1567","mu":"4195"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}}]}

cf022c95-cdab-4842-8f9c-79c390f0e931:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"cf022c95-cdab-4842-8f9c-79c390f0e931","title":{"en":"Hana to Oku-tan"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"花と奥たん"},{"ja":"Hana to Okutan"}],"lastChapter":"17","description":{"en":"Momo, whose nickname is \"Oku-tan,\" is a normal 25-year-old housewife whose hobby is to think about what she can prepare for her husband's dinner all day long. She lives with her pet rabbit P-tan in a Tokyo where a giant flower has for unknown reasons bloomed in the heart of the metropolis, destroying everything in its vicinity. Influenced by mutagenic chemicals released by the flower, the nearby plantlife has mutated and overrun the urban landscape, transforming it into the jungle now known as \"Tokyo Forest.\"\n\nMomo's husband has been missing since the blooming of the flower a year ago, but despite her family asking that she return home to Hokkaido, she insists on waiting for him. The problem is that the man I’m supposed to marry, the legendary knight of the North, is the same man who will end up murdering me and my entire family.\n\nI have to find a way to survive.\n\nWithin the novel itself, there are many daunting challenges ahead of me: I have to find a way to save my husband’s little sister, win over my cold-hearted husband, and gain the support of the people of the North, all of whom currently despise me.\n\n“I’m in love with you!”\n\nSo please, don’t kill me!\n\n---\nI thought I'd finally escaped my hellish life when I died in an airplane crash, but I fell into another nightmare when I awoke as Rudbeckia de Borgia, a minor villain from a historical novel destined to die at the hands of her husband, Iske van Omerta. Surviving with the dysfunctional Borgia family is hard enough, but now I have to marry the man who will kill me! Still, it’s okay, I just have to convince Iske, his family, and all his countrymen that I’m completely harmless! le roman, elle est devenue une méchante qui est morte des mains de son mari. Pour être plus précis, elle est devenue un personnage secondaire qui est morte en étant utilisée comme un outil pour un mariage politique par son père et son frère. Un jour, mon satané père est sorti en rampant et a choisi mon cinquième marié. Le problème est que la personne choisie était le meilleur paladin du Nord et la personne même qui me tuera moi et ma famille dans le futur. D’abord, je dois trouver un moyen de vivre. Dans le roman, avant de trouver un moyen de sauver ma belle-sœur qui allait mourir de mes mains, il y a de nombreux défis que je dois surmonter. Par exemple, faire fondre l’extérieur froid de mon mari, gagner les faveurs des gens du Nord et surmonter le mépris du duc. Si je peux surmonter ces défis, ma vie ne sera-t-elle pas sauvée plus tard? «Je suis tombé amoureux de toi !» Alors s’il te plaît, épargne-moi!\n\n---\nUne jeune coréenne est réincarnée dans le corps de Rudbeckia de Borgia, la seule fille du pape. Cependant, Rudbeckia est destinée à mourir des mains de son époux après avoir été utilisée comme outil dans un mariage politique. Prenant les devants pour changer son destin, elle décide de gagner l'affection de Izek van Omerta du royaume de Britannia, paladin, neveu du roi et héritier du duché d'Omerta. Rudbeckia pourra-t-elle empêcher le meurtre de sa belle-sœur, assassinat qui lui avait coûté la vie? Et Izek, celui qui est supposé tuer Rudbeckia dans le futur, se rangera-t-il aux côtés de son épouse?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%84-%EB%82%B4-%ED%8E%B8%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%EB%A7%8C%EB%93%9C%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2954), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57854767)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/how-to-win-my-husband-over/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=246\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526246)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E7%82%BA%E5%B0%8B%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E7%9A%84%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81/288)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/How-to-Get-My-Husband-on-My-Side/100)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103981)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B6%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81/335)","it":"Nelle righe originali del romanzo, ero una malvagia, usata come strumento politico da mio padre e mio fratello maggiore, che finì per morire per mano del mio futuro marito. Per salvare il suo regno, mio padre pregò disperatamente Isaac di Omerta di sposarmi. Il problema è che l'uomo che dovrei sposare, il leggendario cavaliere del Nord, è lo stesso uomo che finirà per uccidere me e tutta la mia famiglia. Devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere! All'interno del romanzo stesso, ci sono molte sfide scoraggianti: devo trovare un modo per salvare la sorellina di mio marito, conquistare il mio freddo marito e ottenere il sostegno della gente del Nord, che attualmente mi disprezza. \"Sono innamorata di lei!\" Riuscirò nell'impresa?\n\n---\nIn un romanzo, è diventata una malvagia che è morta tra le mani di suo marito. Per la precisione, come \"attrice\" non protagonista, una cattiva che muore dopo essere stata utilizzata come strumento per un matrimonio strategico da suo padre e suo fratello. Un giorno, il mio dannato padre ha strisciato e ha offerto la mia mano al mio quinto sposo. Il problema è che lui è proprio il marito che mi ucciderà e il miglior paladino del nord che in futuro distruggerà la mia famiglia. Per prima cosa, devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere. Nel romanzo ci sono molte difficoltà, come il freddo disprezzo di mio marito, l'odio e il bisogno di controllo dei nordisti e il disprezzo dei contadini, prima di trovare un modo per salvarmi la vita, dovrò risolvere diversi problemi. \"Sono innamorata di te!\" Quindi, per favore, salvami!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** tornei ‘Rudbeckia’, uma coadjuvante em uma história de fantasia, uma vilã que morre pelas mãos de seu marido. O pior pai do mundo me achou outro parceiro para um casamento político. O problema é, essa pessoa é o marido que vai me matar! Primeiro, preciso achar uma forma para viver. Preciso parecer o mais inofensiva possível para o povo do norte e proteger a irmãzinha do meu marido que matei na história original. Não seria capaz de salvar minha vida se fingisse estar apaixonada pelo meu marido?\n\n“Me apaixonei por você à primeira vista!”\n\n“Então, por favor, me poupe!”\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%84-%EB%82%B4-%ED%8E%B8%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%EB%A7%8C%EB%93%9C%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2954), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57854767)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/how-to-win-my-husband-over/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=246\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526246)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E7%82%BA%E5%B0%8B%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E7%9A%84%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81/288)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/How-to-Get-My-Husband-on-My-Side/100)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103981)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B6%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81/335)","ru":"Рудвекиа де Ворхиа является сикстинским ангелом и принцессой Романии, которой предначертано умереть от руки собственного мужа. После того как она стала обычным инструментом в руках верховного понтифика католической церкви и своего старшего брата, она вынуждена вступить в политический брак с лучшим паладином севера, который в будущем должен убить весь ее дом. Теперь девушка должна будет столкнуться с многочисленными трудностями, но ей придется приспособиться и выжить в новых условиях. Сначала ей придется доказать, что она не является опасностью для других людей, потому людям не стоит ее опасаться. Дальше же ей придется убедить всех людей в том, что она совершенно непричастна к делам понтифика и семьи.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%84-%EB%82%B4-%ED%8E%B8%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%EB%A7%8C%EB%93%9C%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2954), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57854767)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/how-to-win-my-husband-over/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=246\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526246)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E7%82%BA%E5%B0%8B%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E7%9A%84%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81/288)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/How-to-Get-My-Husband-on-My-Side/100)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103981)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B6%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81/335)","tr":"Kocasının ellerinde ölen bir kötü kadın karakterin bedenine reenkarne oldum. Daha doğrusu, babası ve erkek kardeşi tarafından siyasi evlilik aracı olarak kullanılırken ölen bir yardımcı karakter oldum. Bir gün, lanet olası babam gitti ve beşinci kocamı seçti. Sorun şu ki, seçilen kişi Kuzey'in en iyi Paladin'i, dahası gelecekte beni ve ailemi öldürecek olan kişiydi. Önce yaşamanın bir yolunu bulmalıyım. Romanda benim ellerimde ölecek olan biricik kız kardeşini kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmadan önce aşmam gereken birçok zorluk var. Kocamın soğuk yüzünü eritmek, Kuzeyli'nin beğenisini kazanmak ve Dük'ün küçümsemesini yenmek gibi. Bu zorlukların üstesinden gelebilirsem, hayatım sonunda kurtulmuş olmaz mı? \"Sana aşık oldum!\" Bu yüzden lütfen beni bağışla!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%84-%EB%82%B4-%ED%8E%B8%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%EB%A7%8C%EB%93%9C%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2954), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57854767)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/how-to-win-my-husband-over/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=246\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526246)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E7%82%BA%E5%B0%8B%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E7%9A%84%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81/288)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/How-to-Get-My-Husband-on-My-Side/100)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103981)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B6%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81/335)","uk":"Вона стала злодійкою, яка померла від рук свого чоловіка в романі. Точніше, вона стала другорядною героїнею, яка померла, коли її батько і брат використовували як інструмент політичного шлюбу. По-перше, я маю знайти спосіб вижити у романі, знайти спосіб врятувати сестру мого чоловіка, яка в оригіналі померла від моїх рук, мені потрібно розтопити холодне серце мого чоловіка, завоювати прихильність населення та подолати презирство герцога. Якщо я зможу подолати ці труднощі, чи не буде моє життя врятовано пізніше? «Я закохався в тебе!» Тож будь ласка, пощади мене!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%84-%EB%82%B4-%ED%8E%B8%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%EB%A7%8C%EB%93%9C%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2954), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57854767)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/how-to-win-my-husband-over/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=246\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526246)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E7%82%BA%E5%B0%8B%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E7%9A%84%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81/288)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/How-to-Get-My-Husband-on-My-Side/100)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103981)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B6%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81/335)","vi":"Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết gốc, tôi là một nhân vật phản diện - người được cha và anh trai sử dụng như một công cụ chính trị và cũng là người hết dưới tay chồng tương lai của mình. Để cứu vương quốc, cha tôi đã tuyệt vọng cầu xin chú rể nắm lấy tay tôi và kết hôn. Vấn đề là người đàn ông mà tôi phải kết hôn chính là hiệp sĩ huyền thoại của phương Bắc và cũng là người đàn ông sẽ tiêu diệt tôi và cả gia đình. Tôi phải tìm cách tồn tại. Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết, có rất nhiều thử thách khó khăn dc đặt ra cho tôi: tôi phải tìm cách cứu em gái của chồng mình, giành dc trái tim của người chồng lạnh lùng và có dc sự ủng hộ của người dân Presencia este magico amor que es como los fuegos artificiales  \n  \nFrance:  \n|| Comment un homme riche et parfait peut-il courir après son misérable premier amour ? L'histoire de cet amour féerique, comme un feu d'artifice ! Si chaque relation doit être entretenue, qu'est notre amour ? Le mien est un feu d'artifice. C'est court ? A cruel betrayal, a terrible conspiracy... In addition to the title story, which is based on a Shakespearean tragedy, this self-selected masterpiece collection contains six other stories, including \"Mother's Day Off\", which is modeled after the mangaka's mother.\n\n- Volume 5 - **[The Red House in the Flood](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/48zjxuc/mizu-no-naka-no-akai-ie)** (水の中の赤い家, Mizu no Naka no Akai Ie), 1973 - A stormy dusk. Her younger brother, Marc, feels inferior to his deceased brother. Jennifer is trapped in the Red House when the river overflows due to heavy rains, and a terrifying evil hand begins to creep up on her... \nIn addition to the title story, this self-selected masterpiece collection includes the fantastical short story \"Moon Festival\" as a special d025de2f-171d-4a25-818a-2080d0c2fe5b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d025de2f-171d-4a25-818a-2080d0c2fe5b","title":{"en":"Etotama"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Eto Tamashii"},{"ja":"えとたま"},{"ja":"干支魂"}],"lastChapter":"26","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["9f348998-ad94-401f-bf3a-426ca90cf6dd"],"description":{"en":"Since ancient times, Japan has upheld the tradition of the 12 Zodiac signs. Eto-musumes (Zodiac girls), who have the appearance and behavior of the animals of the Zodiac, are pure-hearted messengers who act as a bridge between humans and the gods. Every 60 years, the \"ETM 12\" tournament takes place in Tokyo's Akihabara district, where aspiring girls from all over Japan gather for the chance to become the next zodiac sign. It was first serialized in Hong Kong in the newspaper Ming Pao from 20 April 1967 to 12 October 1969. The Chinese title of the novel, Xiao Ao Jiang Hu, literally means to live a carefree life in a mundane world of strife. Alternate English translations of the title include Laughing in the Wind, The Peerless Gallant Errant, and The Proud and Gallant Wanderer. From light-hearted humor, to angst and a taste of the forbidden, each chapter embraces a wide variety of subjects and emotions, exploring the different sexual relationships between eclectic groups of characters. Some of the stories contain elements of bondage, non-con themes, and incest.  \n  \n1) Crazy For You:  \nMizugami is surprised one day when that woman, who was his first and last, suddenly appears after sixteen years and tells him he is a father. Not only that, but his son Yuuri is now his responsibility. Yuuri has always harbored an attraction for his small, cute daddy, and can’t see the man as his father. Can Yuuri help his daddy see beyond the forbidden and accept him as a lover?  \n  \n2) So, I Know All About It:  \nMitomo sleeps with other men for money and as a hobby. Toudou is his childhood friend and wants him to stop, nagging constantly about pride and self-respect. He has always loved Mitomo and has never been with another, wanting to give his first kiss and first experience to his childhood friend. Mitomo knows Toudou is a virgin and taunts him until Toudou finally gives into the seduction, making love for the first time with Mitomo. Just when Toudou thinks that things have changed and all is right in the world, he catches Mitomo with another customer. Can Toudou convince Mitomo to give up his whoring ways?  \n  \n3) Cute Little Devil:  \nIbuki Kaoru is a normal human who keeps 4 demons as pets. The youngest demon, Dooru, is connected to Ibuki because if he doesn’t drink Ibuki’s blood, he can’t survive. Having Dooru drink his blood while he has sex with the demon, fills Ibuki with indescribable pleasure. But at the climax, Dooru always calls the name of another. It makes Ibuki want to bully him. After one particularly harsh punishment, Dooru slips into a coma. Can Ibuki bring the demon back by revealing his true feelings?  \n  \n4) The Sun and the North Wind:  \nSoleil, the sun god, loves Nord, the north wind god. But Nord will have nothing to do with him. The moon god Lune, fed up with the depression in which Soleil has fallen, suggests that the sun god try a different strategy to win over Nord. Soleil challenges the north wind god to a contest, where the winner stands to gain it all. Can the sun god win the game and the heart of the north wind god?  \n  \n5) Heaven:  \nWhat’s the difference between sinful and non-sinful sexual relationships? Is loving someone a sin, even if that person is of the same sex? If wanting to be with the one you love, wishing to share happiness with the one you love is a sin, then why did God give humans bodies of flesh? These are questions that a beautiful priest can not easily answer when pressured with sweet temptation. Will he lose his faith to the dark haired demon that taunts him?  \n  \n6) Display House:  \nTakayuki Mukai lives in the corporate dorms directly across from Meguru Esaka’s home. Meguru is a voyeur, watching Takayuki entertain his guests, and slowly developing feelings for the other man. He uses his knowledge to blackmail Takayuki into giving him shows on a regular basis, having sex with random strangers in the window so that Meguru can watch from his room directly next door. Meguru’s goal is to eventually make Takayuki his. In that showroom where Takayuki’s shameful performance unfolds, will he ever realize the love that Meguru has for him?"},"links":{"al":"32527","mu":"3707"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"5bd0e105-4481-44ca-b6e7-7544da56b1a3","name":{"en":"Incest"}},{"id":"ddefd648-5140-4e5f-ba18-4eca4071d19b","name":{"en":"Shota"}}]}

The Prince sees the grim state of the dried-up town and report on it, but Arshtat scorns this; she declares that Lordlake's citizens deserve their desolation for stealing the Dawn Rune. Arshtat's husband Ferid pulls her back to her senses, and she dismisses the inspection party with a whisper.  \n  \nThe next issue of contention is the Sacred Games for Princess Lymsleia's hand in marriage, being held somewhat early for the ten-year old Lymsleia. The two main contestants, both representing themselves with a champion, hail from rival noble houses: The foppish Euram Barows, and Sialeeds' former fiance, the charismatic Gizel Godwin. The royal family, however, favors the mysterious outsider Belcoot, as a neutral option less likely to cause strife; the Prince attempts to aid Belcoot quietly with Ferid's approval. However, Gizel successfully rigs the Games to his advantage, and his champion Childerich defeats a drugged Belcoot while the Barow's champion is disqualified.  \n  \nHowever, Lord Marscal Godwin, Gizel's father, is less than impressed with Gizel's activities, thinking that he has made an enemy of the Prince and the royal family as a whole with his plotting. Additionally, the royal family took Zegai, the Barows champion, into their own personal custody, who could perhaps help reveal the Godwins cheating and offer an excuse to annul the engagement. Thus, the Godwins launch a preemptive attack at the engagement ceremony in Sol-Falena, Falena's capital. Arshtat and Ferid had anticipated and prepared for the attack, but not the involvement of the elite Nether Gate assassins, who overwhelm the palace's defenses. The struggle culminates in Arshtat and Ferid's deaths, while Lymsleia finds herself a captive. The Prince Ardil, Lyon, Georg, and Sialeeds are forced to flee.  \n  \nVolume 2 Contains 2 Side Stories/Oneshots:  \n\u003e The Secret by Fujuu Mizuki (can also be found in Suikoden 5 Anthology as the 14th story)  \n\u003e The Light that Falls in the Distance"},"links":{"mu":"36527"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

d0e881c9-371f-4e00-a0fd-7648c1c5d7a1:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d0e881c9-371f-4e00-a0fd-7648c1c5d7a1","title":{"en":"Koukyuu no Zatsuyouki"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"後宮の雑用姫"},{"en":"The Chore Princess of the Inner Palace"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Shaolan (Xiao Lian) is an orphaned girl who lives alone in the mountains at the very nook of an impoverished village. One day, an envoy from the palace arrives and scouts her to to be a lady-in-waiting for the imperial harem. This was how a wild girl raised on the mountains was able to live in a luxurious palace working as a lady-in-waiting, however...\n\nOn her first day (due to various reasons), Shaolan had suddenly become a criminal after slapping one of the consorts.\n\nThough execution appeared certain, she was specially pardoned and demoted from a lady-in-waiting to a maidservant in charge of odd jobs. The main character's name is Takako Hana-no-Takako, but her name is Hana-Pecha, so \"Pechako-chan\" is a bright, active, girl who's a bit chubby in the first grade of elementary school. \n\nThis is a heartwarming and relaxing work depicting the happy days of Pechako-chan, her cute little sister \"Mamitan,\" the people in Hana's family, her boyfriend \"Itchan\" who's slightly precocious, and their friends. \n\nThe mangaka is Yoko Imamura, a pioneer in shojo manga. Since she is not a resident of the human world, she can untie her braids and use magic. She gets tired of living in a castle and runs away from home to the human world with her companion rabbit, Mimitaro! A lot of wonderful events were waiting there, but at the same time troubles and accidents occurred one after another. Amu-chan solves cases by using the power of gems in order, such as diamonds in April (conveying eternal love), emeralds in May (for happiness), and pearls in June (for curing illnesses)! The story explores the relationship between these characters.\n\n---\n- [Original Web Book \u003cAladin\u003e](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=11989437)\n\n- [Original Web Book \u003cRidiBooks\u003e](https://ridibooks.com/books/297001767)\n\n- [Original Web Book \u003cMr.Blue\u003e](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/dw_0350)\n\n- [Original Web Book \u003cNaver\u003e](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=417806)","ko":"짜잔~등장인물 소개코너~ 윤아소 : 범생이 인생 17년만에 초보 날라리로 대변신 사반디 : 아마추어 점술가. 어린왕자같은 사랑을 기다리는중 ♡ 강시울 : 남자로 태어나지 못한 게 한인 톰보이 걸! 그외 등장인물 : 나마시, 신새바, 추실솔 주인공을 능가하는 엑스트라들의 파릇파릇한 청춘 보고서\n\n---\n- [Original Web Book \u003cAladin\u003e](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=11989437)\n\n- [Original Web Book \u003cRidiBooks\u003e](https://ridibooks.com/books/297001767)\n\n- [Original Web Book \u003cMr.Blue\u003e](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/dw_0350)\n\n- [Original Web Book \u003cNaver\u003e](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=417806)"},"links":{"ap":"xtra-syndrome","mu":"26938"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}
